name: Venomoth
description: The Poison Moth Pokémon. The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon can ignore a negative status condition that results from an enemy move.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on all saving throws against being burned, frozen, poisoned, or paralyzed.
